awakened:BurningStudy.NAME: Burning Study
awakened:BurningStudy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

awakened:Cryostasis.NAME: Cryostasis
awakened:Cryostasis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

awakened:Darkleech.NAME: Darkleech
awakened:Darkleech.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Draw !awakened:m2! card. NL Exhaust.
awakened:Darkleech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Draw !awakened:m2! cards. NL Exhaust.

awakened:Feather.NAME: Feather
awakened:Feather.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

awakened:Chromatics.NAME: Chromatics
awakened:Chromatics.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard your hand, then awakened:Conjure !M!.

awakened:AwokenStrike.NAME: Awoken Strike
awakened:AwokenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [awakened:icon] 1: to ALL enemies. NL [awakened:icon] 3: twice.

awakened:OneForOne.NAME: One for One
awakened:OneForOne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random cost 0 card from your draw pile into your hand.
awakened:OneForOne.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

awakened:MultiMagic.NAME: Multi-Magic
awakened:MultiMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [awakened:icon] 1: Gain !B! Block. NL [awakened:icon] 3: Draw !M! card.
awakened:MultiMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [awakened:icon] 1: Gain !B! Block. NL [awakened:icon] 3: Draw !M! cards.

awakened:StudyPyromancy.NAME: Study Pyromancy
awakened:StudyPyromancy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Greater *Pyromancy to your Spells.

awakened:GreaterPyromancy.NAME: Greater Pyromancy
awakened:GreaterPyromancy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

awakened:WingAttack.NAME: Wing Attack
awakened:WingAttack.DESCRIPTION: awakened:Flying. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

awakened:SmartStrike.NAME: Smart Strike
awakened:SmartStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your hand contains at least 5 other cards, deal !D! damage again.

awakened:Shadow.NAME: Shadow
awakened:Shadow.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Cannot be removed from your deck.

awakened:ShadowShock.NAME: Shadow Shock
awakened:ShadowShock.DESCRIPTION: Comes with a *Shadow. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

awakened:CursedClamor.NAME: Cursed Clamor
awakened:CursedClamor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you still have Energy after playing this, gain [E] [E] [E] .

awakened:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
awakened:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL If X is 0, gain [E] and Exhaust.

awakened:MiracleWorker.NAME: Miracle Worker
awakened:MiracleWorker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Miracle on top of your draw pile.
awakened:MiracleWorker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Miracle+ on top of your draw pile.

awakened:Intensify.NAME: Intensify
awakened:Intensify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Colorless card this turn is played twice.

awakened:Distract.NAME: Distract
awakened:Distract.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

awakened:PeerThrough.NAME: Peer Through
awakened:PeerThrough.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL It costs 0 this turn.

awakened:PiercingCall.NAME: Piercing Call
awakened:PiercingCall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL awakened:Conjure !M!. NL It costs 0 this turn.

awakened:CultDaggers.NAME: Cult Daggers
awakened:CultDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each other cost 0 card in your hand.

awakened:ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
awakened:ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Comes with a *Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

awakened:LocusStrike.NAME: Locus Strike
awakened:LocusStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each time you awakened:Conjured this combat.

awakened:Punishment.NAME: Punishment
awakened:Punishment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Weak and Vulnerable, steal !M! Strength.

awakened:FlamingSummons.NAME: Flaming Summons
awakened:FlamingSummons.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

awakened:InResponse.NAME: In Response...
awakened:InResponse.DESCRIPTION: Conjure !M!. NL Whenever you play a Spell, gain !awakened:m2! Block.

awakened:BookOfTricks.NAME: Book of Tricks
awakened:BookOfTricks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL [awakened:icon] 1: And !awakened:m2! Artifact. NL [awakened:icon] 3: And !awakened:m3! Thorns.
